title: RBL Bank launches fuel credit card with IOCL
description: RBL Bank has launched the 'Xtra Credit Card' in partnership with Indian Oil Corporation, offering customers up to 8.5% savings on fuel purchases. The bank expects a moderate growth of 12-15% in its credit card portfolio this fiscal year. The card will be issued via the Mastercard network and offers significant fuel points for every â‚¹100 spent.
